subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Since Jas0n Varitek turned 36 on Friday and is in the final year of a four-year, $40 million deal, the Red Sox have to determine how much they are willing to invest to re-sign him.
snippet: Since Jas0n Varitek turned 36 on Friday and is in the final year of a four-year, $40 million deal, the Red Sox have to determine how much they are willing to invest to re-sign him.
